title: ONLY way! No more anxiety playing Ranked
body:
If you're the person who can handle all the toxic players or you can leave the argument alone to continue playing the game, then you're perfect and  this threat isn't right for you.

So the ONLY way to handle toxic and no more anxiety playing ranked is...
- In rank you can duo with only 1 person (But it's obvious avoid to rank with, if the person is also one of the toxic players)


- Riot enables players **to mute**, **show player names** and **disable [ALL] Chat** - opposing site cannot communicate
... Just disable all these.

- To mute - in the TAB
- Show Player names and Disable [ALL] Chat are in the VIDEO settings or Press ESC to look for them.
- Change your name to 'afsadfjaionvf' you can't even read your name then.

Note: By doing this, you treat yourself as playing any types of LOL games as playing with bot or You're playing individually by blocking the communication.

There isn't excuses for losing games, let just blame everything on yourself and if you get report or banned there are so many things to do out there in the world.
 ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
That's it.
Keep in mind, just a game,
